description:
You will learn everything about your iOS 8 Device whether your on a iPad, iPhone, or iPod Touch.

Air Drop, AirPlay, App Switcher, App, Book & iTunes Stores, Calculator, Calendars, Clock, Compass, Continuity, Control Center, Facetime, Find iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch & Mac, G Game Center, Health, iBooks, iCloud, iTunes & App Store, iTunes U, Mail, Maps, Messages, Music, Newsstand, Notes, Notifications Center "Applications", Notifications Center "Today", Passbook & Apple Pay, Phone, Photos & Camera, Podcast, Reachability, Recents & Favorites, Reminders, Remote, Safari, Settings App, Social Media, Stocks, Tips, Videos, Voice Memos, Weather, Widgets
title:  Apple iOS 8 Complete Course
